$(EXECUTABLE_NAME)

$(PRODUCT_NAME)
APPL
$(MARKETING_VERSION)
$(CURRENT_PROJECT_VERSION)
$(MACOSX_DEPLOYMENT_TARGET)
GardenBridge needs Apple Events access to execute AppleScript automations requested by AI assistants.
GardenBridge uses Bluetooth to connect with nearby devices when requested by AI assistants.
GardenBridge needs calendar access to let AI assistants read and create calendar events on your behalf.
GardenBridge needs full calendar access to let AI assistants read and create calendar events on your behalf.
GardenBridge needs camera access to capture photos when requested by AI assistants.
GardenBridge needs contacts access to let AI assistants find contact information and birthdays.
GardenBridge uses your local network to discover nearby devices when requested by AI assistants.
GardenBridge needs location access to provide your current location to AI assistants when requested.
GardenBridge needs location access to provide your current location to AI assistants when requested.
GardenBridge needs microphone access for audio capture when requested by AI assistants.
GardenBridge needs access to Apple Music to read your media library when requested by AI assistants.
GardenBridge needs access to your media library when requested by AI assistants.
GardenBridge needs permission to save photos when requested by AI assistants.
GardenBridge needs access to your photo library when requested by AI assistants.
NSApplication
GardenBridge needs reminders access to let AI assistants read and create reminders on your behalf.
GardenBridge needs full reminders access to let AI assistants read and create reminders on your behalf.
GardenBridge needs screen capture access to take screenshots when requested by AI assistants.
